**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 37 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32 [Kellid Graveknight](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2336) **Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 401 **Perception** +27; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)darkvision **Languages** [Hallit](/Languages.aspx?ID=37) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +29, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +32, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +30, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +27, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +27 **Str** +8 **Dex** +5 **Con** +4 **Int** +2 **Wis** +5 **Cha** +4 **Items** _+1 [greater frost](/Equipment.aspx?ID=296) [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=380) dagger_, _[resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=147) splint mail_, _+2 [greater frost](/Equipment.aspx?ID=296) [warhammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=47)_ --- **AC** 37 **Fort** +24 **Ref** +25 **Will** +27 **HP** 255 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42), rejuvenation) **Immunities** cold, death effects, disease, paralyzed, poison, precision, and unconscious **Sacrilegious Aura** ([abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2), [aura](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=5), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64)) 30 feet. When a creature in the aura uses a [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) spell or ability, the graveknight automatically attempts to counteract it, with a +23 counteract modifier.
**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _warhammer_ +30 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)), **Damage** 3d8+16 bludgeoning plus 1d6 cold **Melee** _dagger_ +28 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 3d4+14 piercing plus 1d6 cold **Ranged** _dagger_ +27 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d4+14 piercing plus 1d6 cold **Devastating Blast** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) The graveknight unleashes a 30-foot cone of energy. Creatures in the area take 8d12 cold damage (DC 34 basic Reflex save). The graveknight can use this ability once every 1d4 rounds. **Repulsing Blow** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Requirements** The graveknight's last action was a success with a Strike using a shove weapon. **Effect** The target struck by the shove weapon is knocked back 10 feet and must succeed at a DC 33 Will save or be unable to approach within 5 feet of the graveknight for 1 round. If the last action was a critical hit, the target automatically fails the Will save. **Graveknight's Curse** This curse affects anyone who wears a graveknight's armor for at least 1 hour. **Saving Throw** DC 34 Will save; **Onset** 1 hour; **Stage 1** [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9) 1 and cannot remove the armor (1 day); **Stage 2** doomed 2, hampered 10, and cannot remove the armor (1 day); **Stage 3** dies and transforms into the armor's graveknight. **Weapon Master** The graveknight has access to the critical specialization effects of any weapons it wields.
name: Kellid Graveknight
